title: Microcosm
creator_credit: Peter Dodds, Ross Campbell and Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre
brief_description: A man-made lake is Somers, Victoria, is the setting for a study of bird and insect life in both summer and winter. Debussy’s prelude “a L’Apres-Midi D’Un Faune” accompanies the images. Non-narrated. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
